title: Understanding the Terms
text: Autism spectrum disorder (ASD) is a broader term that includes various conditions, while autism is a specific condition within this spectrum.

title: Exploring the Spectrum
text: The term 'spectrum' in ASD indicates a range of symptoms and severity levels, encompassing different conditions like Asperger's syndrome and pervasive developmental disorder.

hintAnswer: It implies a range of symptoms and severity levels.
title: Defining Autism Spectrum Disorder
text: What does the term 'spectrum' imply in autism spectrum disorder?
choices: It implies a range of symptoms and severity levels
It refers to a single condition
It means the same as autism

hintAnswer: Autism is a specific condition within the autism spectrum.
title: Clarifying Autism
text: Is autism a specific condition or a broad term?
choices: Autism is a specific condition within the autism spectrum
Autism is unrelated to the spectrum
